1.title: About
1.summary: I am a 23 year old aspiring software developer currently studying my third year to become a master of engineering in the field of information technology at Linköping University.

3.underTitle: Master of engineering in IT at Linköping university
3.summary: A technical master of engineering degree with large focus on group work and problem solving.

4.underTitle: High school with focus on IT, JB gymnastiet in Jönköping

6.underTitle: Soldier in the Swedish Armed Forces
6.summary: Traffic/logistic soldier in the national MOVCON-platoon at the logistic regiment in Skövde. As a traffic soldier in the Swedish armed forces I was part of the movement control unit which mission outside of the standard military duty was to handle logistics and transportation of military units. My duties included combat training, vehicle service, transportation and communication.

8.underTitle: Good knowledge in Java and Android development.
8.summary: I have studied Object-oriented programming, data structures and algorithms aswell as Android development. I have also used Java a great deal when working on my own project in my spare time.

9.underTitle: Basic knowledge of Javascript and web development.
9.summary: My skills in web development comes mostly form building this website using HTML, CSS and the Javascript library React.
